title: Murgh makhani (Indian butter chicken curry)
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons fat free natural yoghurt', '1 tablespoon tandoori masala powder', '675g boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 3cm pieces', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1 (2.5cm) piece fresh ginger', '1 clove garlic', '2 tablespoons water', '3 tablespoons cooking oil, divided', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1/4 teaspoon Indian chilli powder', '250g passata', '125ml double cream', '125ml milk', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 teaspoon dried fenugreek leaves', '1 teaspoon salt']
